data.event: Nearby is Bait Na'aman (Nu'man), a four-towered fort of the 17th-century iman Bil'arab bin Sultan, renovated in 1991.

event.title: now under construction in Barka, called

data.event: In addition, a new quarter is now under construction in Barka, called "Blue City" (المدينة الزقاء), located in Sawadi.
